title: Bows (skill)
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

*For the bows still in the game, that now use the [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons") skill, see [shortbow](/Shortbow "Shortbow") and [longbow](/Longbow "Longbow").*

The **Bows** skill governs your character's mastery of [shortbows](/Shortbow "Shortbow") and [longbows](/Longbow "Longbow"). All bows are ranged weapons that require two hands to fire [arrows](/Arrow "Arrow"). See the [weapon](/Weapon#Ranged_weapons "Weapon") page for a list of all bows and their properties.

## Contents

- [1 Aptitudes](#Aptitudes)
- [2 List of Bows](#List_of_Bows)
- [3 See Also](#See_Also)
- [4 History](#History)

## Aptitudes

| -------------------------------- | --- | --- | ----- | ----- | ------ | ----------------------- | ----- | --------- | ---- |
| [Shortbow](/Shortbow "Shortbow") | 9   | +2  | 13    | Two   | Medium | [Arrow](/Arrow "Arrow") | No    | Non-melee | 10   |
| [Longbow](/Longbow "Longbow")    | 15  | +0  | 17    | Two   | Large  | [Arrow](/Arrow "Arrow") | No    | Non-melee | 10   |

## See Also

- [Hunter](/Hunter "Hunter")
- [Arcane Marksman](/Arcane_Marksman "Arcane Marksman")

## History

- In [0.29](/0.29 "0.29"), this skill was merged into the [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons") skill.

html:
Bows (skill)

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

For the bows still in the game, that now use the Ranged Weapons skill, see shortbow and longbow.

The Bows skill governs your character's mastery of shortbows and longbows. All bows are ranged weapons that require two hands to fire arrows. See the weapon page for a list of all bows and their properties.

Contents

  • 1 Aptitudes
  • 2 List of Bows
  • 3 See Also
  • 4 History

Aptitudes

List of Bows

Name Dam Hit Speed Hands Size Missile Throw Dam Type Prob
Shortbow 9 +2 13 Two Medium Arrow No Non-melee 10
Longbow 15 +0 17 Two Large Arrow No Non-melee 10

See Also

  • Hunter
  • Arcane Marksman

History

  • In 0.29, this skill was merged into the Ranged Weapons skill.

''For the bows still in the game, that now use the [[Ranged Weapons]] skill, see [[shortbow]] and [[longbow]].''

The '''Bows''' skill governs your character's mastery of [[shortbow]]s and [[longbow]]s. All bows are ranged weapons that require two hands to fire [[arrow]]s. See the [[weapon#Ranged weapons|weapon]] page for a list of all bows and their properties.
